# Icon

Choose a version:2026-01 latest2025-10 2025-07 2025-04 2025-01 2024-10 2024-07 2024-04 2024-01 2023-10 2025-07# IconAsk assistantThis component renders an icon from a predefined list. Choose the one that suits your needs.

## [Anchor to iconprops](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#iconprops)IconProps[Anchor to name](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#iconprops-propertydetail-name)name**name**IconNameIconName**IconNameIconName**required**required**Specifies the name of the icon that will be displayed.

[Anchor to accessibilityLabel](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#iconprops-propertydetail-accessibilitylabel)accessibilityLabel**accessibilityLabel**string**string**A label that describes the purpose or contents of the element. When set, it will be announced to users using assistive technologies and will provide them with more context. When set, any children or `label` supplied will not be announced to screen readers.

[Anchor to id](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#iconprops-propertydetail-id)id**id**string**string**A unique identifier for the icon.

[Anchor to size](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#iconprops-propertydetail-size)size**size**| 'base'

/**

* `fill` will take the space available in the container and keep the icon's proportion.

*/

| 'fill'**| 'base'

/**

* `fill` will take the space available in the container and keep the icon's proportion.

*/

| 'fill'**Default: 'base'**Default: 'base'**Adjusts the size of the icon.

[Anchor to tone](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#iconprops-propertydetail-tone)tone**tone**'inherit' | 'critical'**'inherit' | 'critical'**Default: 'inherit'**Default: 'inherit'**Set the color of the icon.

- `inherit` will take the color value from its parent, giving the link a monochrome appearance.

| 'WandMinor' | 'WearableMajor' | 'WeightMinor' | 'WholesaleMajor' | 'WifiMajor'`**ExamplesSimple Icon exampleReactJSCopy91234567import {render, Icon} from '@shopify/ui-extensions-react/admin';render('Playground', () => <App />);function App() {  return <Icon name="AppsMajor" />;}## Preview### Examples- #### Simple Icon exampleReact```

import {render, Icon} from '@shopify/ui-extensions-react/admin';

render('Playground', () => <App />);

function App() {

return <Icon name="AppsMajor" />;

}

```JS```

import {extend, Icon} from '@shopify/ui-extensions/admin';

extend('Playground', (root) => {

const icon = root.createComponent(Icon, {name: 'AppsMajor'});

root.appendChild(icon);

});

```## [Anchor to availableIcons](/docs/api/admin-extensions/2025-07/ui-components/media-and-visuals/icon#availableIcons)Available IconsThe available Icons are a 1:1 map of what Icons are available in Polaris. You can find the full list of Icons in the [Polaris Icons documentation](https://polaris.shopify.com/icons).
